title: Amy Opens Up About Surgery She's Having + Bobby's Ex Reaches Out To Him
itunes:title: Amy Opens Up About Surgery She's Having + Bobby's Ex Reaches Out To Him
description:
Amy tells us about a surgery she has decided to have. One of Bobby's ex-girlfriends reaches out to him about his will. Also, Bobby recaps if he cried watching Manchester By The Sea.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
